name: Make Your Own Quiz
description: This app gives you the ability to make a variety of fun and education quizzes. 3 different question types are included Multiple Choice, Short Answer and True/False. You can also add images to your quizzes for some extra fun. You can also create personality quizzes and test your friends to see what superhero they are or so much more. Save your quizzes in one of the 6 provided save slots so you can play them again later or have others play them. Also try out the matching quiz, enter 6 different images and see how fast you can match the pictures to each other.
